empty.noProjectsDescription: Get started by creating your first project

members.title: Members
members.subtitle: Manage organization members and their roles
members.search: Search members by name or email...

invite.title: Invite Members
invite.description: Share this invite code with people you want to join your organization
invite.instructions: Share this code with your team members. They can use it during registration or in the Join Organization page.

remove.title: Remove Member
remove.description: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the organization?
remove.warning: This action cannot be undone. The member will lose access to all organization resources.

empty.title: No members found
empty.description: Try adjusting your search or filters

settings.title: Organization Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your organization details and preferences

name.label: Organization Name
name.description: This is your organization's display name

slug.label: Organization Identifier
slug.description: Used in URLs. Can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores

description.label: Description
description.description: A brief description of your organization (max 500 characters)

invite.title: Invite Code
invite.description: Use this code to invite new members to your organization
invite.regenerateWarning: Regenerating will invalidate the current code. Are you sure?

leave.title: Leave Organization
leave.description: Are you sure you want to leave {orgName}?
leave.warning: You will lose access to all organization resources and projects.
leave.cannotLeave: Organization owners cannot leave. Transfer ownership first.

delete.title: Delete Organization
delete.description: This will permanently delete {orgName} and all associated data.
delete.warning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All projects, tasks, and data will be lost.
delete.confirmText: Type the organization name to confirm

archive.title: Archive Organization
archive.description: Archive {orgName} to hide it without deleting data

permissions.adminOnly: Only administrators can modify these settings
permissions.ownerOnly: Only the organization owner can perform this action

errors.accessDenied: You don't have access to this organization
errors.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to perform this action
